alert.note: Alert for Beauregard; Vernon (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Beauregard and southern Vernon Parishes through 715 PM CDT... At 630 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Fort Johnson, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... De Ridder, Rosepine, Pitkin, Sugartown, Fort Johnson, New Llano, Fullerton, Cravens, and Pickering. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
